title: What Recovery Actually Means
description: Learn What Recovery Actually Means in one minute.

hook.text: Recovery isn't just sitting on the couch. It's an active biological process involving every system in your body.

buildup.text: After exercise, your body repairs muscle fibers, replenishes glycogen, clears metabolic waste, and adapts.

climax.text: True recovery means every system is ready for the next challenge, not just that soreness faded.

punchline.text: Recovery is more than feeling less sore. It's full system readiness.
